mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ScmQualifieInfo WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT * FROM ScmQualifieInfo WHERE controlUnitNo=#{controlUnitNo} ORDER BY updateTimeStamp ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ScmQualifieInfo ( vendorId, typeId, source, qualifyAudit, required, creator, createDate, editor, editDate, checker, checkDate, qualificationStatus, controlUnitNo ) VALUES ( #{vendorId}, #{typeId}, #{source}, #{qualifyAudit}, #{required}, #{creator}, #{createDate}, #{editor}, #{editDate}, #{checker}, #{checkDate}, #{qualificationStatus}, #{controlUnitNo} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ScmQualifieInfo set vendorId=#{vendorId}, typeId=#{typeId}, source=#{source}, qualifyAudit=#{qualifyAudit}, required=#{required}, creator=#{creator}, createDate=#{createDate}, editor=#{editor}, editDate=#{editDate}, checker=#{checker}, checkDate=#{checkDate}, qualificationStatus=#{qualificationStatus}, controlUnitNo=#{controlUnitNo} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM ScmQualifieInfo WHERE id IN (${value})
mapper.select: SELECT ScmQualifieInfo.*,ScmSupplier.status as vendorStatus,ScmSupplierQualifyType.name as typeName, ScmSupplierQualifyType.code as qualifieTypeCode,ScmSupplier.qualificationStatus as vendorQualificationStatus FROM ScmQualifieInfo,ScmSupplier,ScmSupplierQualifyType WHERE ScmQualifieInfo.VendorId = #{vendorId} and ScmQualifieInfo.VendorId=ScmSupplier.id and ScmQualifieInfo.typeId=ScmSupplierQualifyType.id group by ScmQualifieInfo.id ORDER BY ScmQualifieInfo.id ASC

SELECT ScmQualifieInfo.*,scmsupplier.status as vendorStatus,scmsupplier.qualificationStatus as vendorQualificationStatus,scmsupplierqualifytype.name as typeName, scmsupplierqualifytype.code as qualifieTypeCode,scmbaseattachment.id as attachMentId,scmbaseattachment.docType as attachMentDocType FROM ScmQualifieInfo left join scmbaseattachment on scmbaseattachment.billType='ScmQualifieInfo' and scmbaseattachment.billId=scmqualifieinfo.id, scmsupplier,scmsupplierqualifytype WHERE scmqualifieinfo.VendorId = #{vendorId} and scmqualifieinfo.VendorId=scmsupplier.id and scmqualifieinfo.typeId=scmsupplierqualifytype.id ORDER BY scmqualifieinfo.id ASC
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM ScmQualifieInfo WHERE VendorId = #{vendorId} and id not in (SELECT distinct billId FROM scmbaseattachment where billType='ScmQualifieInfo' group by billId)
mapper.update: update ScmQualifieInfo set qualificationStatus = #{status} where VendorId = #{vendorId} and controlUnitNo=#{controlUnitNo}
